GSD.product_version: versions from v4.19.256 to before v4.19.258
GSD.description:
wifi: iwlegacy: 4965: corrected fix for potential off-by-one overflow in il4965_rs_fill_link_cmd()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.258 by commit 135861f9e79dd9f533f665b75f8f7f87cad9a9dd, it was introduced in version v4.19.256 by commit 20be29b99dfed089fe7b8698cd18dfdda6049bd7. For more details please see the references link.
